comprehensive_overview: Blosc2 is a high-performance, production-ready meta-compressor library that provides a simple way to accelerate data storage and retrieval. It focuses on optimizing the handling of large, multi-dimensional data, catering to both compression and decompression operations efficiently.
core_features:
1. Multi-dimensional data support
2. High-performance compression and decompression
3. Production-ready meta-compressor library
4. Data storage and retrieval optimization
5. Supported by various programming languages
6. Parallel compression with thread and process-based approaches
